  • Element
com.vectorprint.report.itext.annotations

Annotation Type Element


  • @Documented
@Inherited
@Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Element
    You can annotate classes in your data to be added to a report as implementations of Element and styled according to styleClasses. When a container is active the element will be added to the active container if possible.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl
    See Also:
    DataType, GetData, ElementProducer.createElement(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Class, java.util.List), StylerFactory.getStylers(java.lang.String[])

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      GetData dataFunction
      the function to call to get the data from an instance of the annotated class
      DataType dataType
      only used when defining multiple Elements
      Class<? extends com.itextpdf.text.Element> iTextClass 
      String iTextClassMethod
      an optional method in your data class returning an implementation of Element.
      String[] styleClasses 
      String styleClassesMethod
      the optional name of the function that will yield styleClasses as a String[]

    • Element Detail

      • iTextClass

        public abstract Class<? extends com.itextpdf.text.Element> iTextClass
        Default:
        com.itextpdf.text.Phrase.class

      • iTextClassMethod

        public abstract String iTextClassMethod
        an optional method in your data class returning an implementation of Element.
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • styleClasses

        public abstract String[] styleClasses
        Default:
        ""

      • styleClassesMethod

        public abstract String styleClassesMethod
        the optional name of the function that will yield styleClasses as a String[]
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • dataType

        public abstract DataType dataType
        only used when defining multiple Elements
        Returns:
        Default:
        @com.vectorprint.report.itext.annotations.DataType

      • dataFunction

        public abstract GetData dataFunction
        the function to call to get the data from an instance of the annotated class
        Returns:

        @com.vectorprint.report.itext.annotations.GetData
